AboutMe_text1: As a Junior Software Developer, I possess solid knowledge in JavaScript and Angular. Software development has been a constant throughout my professional life. Starting with programming PLCs during my apprenticeship, I developed an interest in high-level languages during my studies. In my free time, I work with C/C++ and Qt.
AboutMe_text2: If you think I'd be a good match for your projects, contact me!
